import React, { Component } from 'react' import SelectFilter from './select' import AddArticle from './addArticle' import toggleDecorator from '../decorators/toggleDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import ToggleCreate from './toggleCreate' import ToggleSelect from './toggleSelect' import Menu from './menu' class Header extends Component { state={ isOpenSection: null, isOpenSelect: false } handleClick (index) { this.setState({ isOpenSection: this.state.isOpenSection === index ? null : index }) } toggleOpenSelect = ()=> { this.setState({ isOpenSelect: !this.state.isOpenSelect }) } openSelect render(){ return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{ this.state.isOpenSelect ? : null }
) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
